Hierarchy Data Operation Base Classes

These classes serve as abstract base classes for concrete patch data hierarchy operations classes. A base class is provided for each numerical type since the collection of operations which applies to each type is unique. A hierarchy data operation manager class is also provided here.

  • SAMRAI::math::HierarchyDataOpsComplex
  • SAMRAI::math::HierarchyDataOpsInteger
  • SAMRAI::math::HierarchyDataOpsReal
  • SAMRAI::math::HierarchyDataOpsManager
